articles.author: ABDUL SATTAR
articles.title: Gunmen kill 20 miners in an attack in southwest Pakistan ahead of an Asian security summit - The Associated Press
articles.description: Police say gunmen killed 20 miners and wounded another seven in Pakistan’s southwest. It’s the latest attack in restive Balochistan province and comes days ahead of a major security summit being hosted in the capital. Police official Hamayun Khan Nasir said t…
articles.content: QUETTA, Pakistan (AP) Gunmen killed 20 miners and wounded another seven in Pakistans southwest, a police official said Friday, drawing condemnation from authorities as a search was launched for the a… [+4294 chars]
